item.description: score:-9 Chances: Bankers See Lower Delinquency Rates With Easing Cycle in Brazil CEOs of major Brazil lenders see ‘unique opportunity’ for local economy Brazil’s Bradesco expects ‘reasonable’ deal with Americanas by June Risks: Banco Bradesco S.A.
